snippet.title: For cartoon editor, a New Yorker state of mind
snippet.description: Bob Mankoff's understanding of how humor works crackles through his new memoir.

snippet.title: What Obama and the tea party have in common
snippet.description: Obama and the tea party both disdain governing the way Madison intended.

snippet.title: Hans Riegel, German confectioner whose company made gummi bears, dies at 90
snippet.description: Mr. Riegel helped bring the bear-shaped, fruit-flavored gelatins known as gummi bears to candy lovers.

snippet.title: Is it funny to be Jewish? Is it Jewish to be funny?
snippet.description: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Circumcision Ceremony

snippet.title: The STEM workforce you probably didn't know about
snippet.description: Innovations in 5 | A new report shows many who contribute to the STEM economy are going unnoticed.

snippet.title: Comedian Louis C.K. electrifies the Kennedy Center crowd
snippet.description: Star of hit FX show 'Louie' delights with high-brow barbs, body humor and a heavy dose of self-deprecation.

snippet.title: For mystery writer Barbara Mertz's 85th birthday, friends bring Egypt to her
snippet.description: Barbara Mertz has been producing Egypt-themed novels for more than four decades.

snippet.title: Monica Lewinsky shopping a book
snippet.description: SHE THE PEOPLE | Maybe we're in for a surprise as Lewinsky pitches her book to publishing houses.

snippet.title: "The Book of Mormon Girl: A Memoir of an American Faith" by Joanna Brooks
snippet.description: In "The Price of the Ticket: Barack Obama and the Rise and Decline of Black Politics," Fredrick C. Harris argues that as a result of Obama's historic presidency, issues of racial inequality and injustice have been pushed further to the margins of national politics.

snippet.title: Book World: 'The Lost Prince,' by Selden Edwards, is a time-traveling sequel
snippet.description: Set in fin-de-siecle Vienna, "The Lost Prince," by Selden Edwards, is a time-traveling sequel to "The Little Book."
